name: Frankie The Flying Fox
description:
This game aims to increase knowledge of the ecological importance of red flying foxes and encourage coexistence through a ‘Circle-of-Life’ style approach of how 600 species of Australian native plants and animals rely on flying foxes for survival. 


This game is an ‘Endless Runner’ style game and therefor does not have a definitive ending however, players must aim to reach the furthest distance without being struck down by an obstacle while maintaining as high a fruit count as possible. While fruit total does not directly impact the success of the players run through, it is encouraged that players aim to maximize their fruit collection for Frankie the Flying Foxes sake.
